attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PLEASE HELP.
We need urgent help from the goverment to stop our council ruining our childrens education by joining schools together to make federation schools.
Our children will then have to be ferried around by bus between three schools, losing valuable teaching time, creating more pollution aswell as the increased risk of accidents on the road. Our schools work really well now and there is a brilliant standard of education, please help us to stop this stupid change happening for the sake of our children.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
